title: Airwheel golden technologies electric Self-balancing Scooter
text: Airwheel golden technologies electric Self-balancing Scooter , 25 September 2015 -- With the new designs of varied Airwheel electric scooter types, Airwheel riders are provided with four riding formats and can choose their favorite riding format with Airwheel electric scooter.Basically, there are four riding formats with Airwheel electric self-balancing scooter: single-wheeled scooter riding, twin-wheeled scooter riding, two-wheeled scooter riding with standing posture and two-wheeled scooter riding with sitting-posture. It is hardly to say which riding format is the most popular one. In fact, each type of Airwheel riding format will be favored by a specific group of people. Riding with Airwheel single-wheeled electric scooter is more exciting and exhilarating since the standing-posture riding on a single wheel has big differences from people’s normal riding habit, and this is why so many riders are attracted and feel like trying this new fresh way of riding. Comparatively, riding with twin-wheeled electric scooter easier since the twin-wheeled designs makes it easier to keep balance and improves riding stability. Many female riders love riding with Airwheel electric self-balancing scooter since the scooter is featured by more riding simplicity and easy to ride with steadiness. Airwheel two-wheeled electric scooters are divided into two riding formats: one is standing-posture riding while the other is sitting-posture riding. Riding with Airwheel two-wheeled electric scooter with standing-posture is much easier since riders do not need to keep balance and can control the direction by handles, besides, there is a display screen equipped on the handle so that riders can see real-time data of the running state of the electric scooter. Comparatively, those riders who are always staying in- house working or playing computers are likely to ride with standing-posture scooter since riders can keep upright during the riding. However, the new release Airwheel A3 self-balancing scooter is a complete new type of Airwheel electric scooter that supports sitting-posture riding. In fact, Airwheel A3 two-wheeled electric scooter is more suitable for long-distance travels since the sitting-posture riding is more labor-saving and relaxing. Generally speaking, riders can experience different riding formats according to their needs and preferences. Airwheel electric scooter will satisfy people’s varied riding needs with diversified scooter types in the future. About: Established in 2004, Airwheel Technology was initiated by a group of pioneers who took constant adventure to reshape the world with edged technology. With a global view, the U.S.-based enterprise started to build since its establishment R&D centers located in L.A., Beijing, and Changzhou, a marketing center in Beijing and a manufacturing center in Changzhou. As the leader in global portable intelligent transport industry, we have been dedicated to extend the fun and benefit of cutting-edge technology to everywhere in the world.
